participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and open-minded, enjoys exploring new cuisines and cultures.
participant_1.background: i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves to engage in fun activities and express creativity.
participant_2.background: i am in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground.

content.text: Do you wanna build a snowman?
